text: Hi there! We migrated our website from WordPress to HubSpot. We had an accessibility audit and found that a lot of the menus and headings were difficult to tab through. Apologies I'm a newbie on accessibility and HubSpot so these are basic questions. What's involved in improving this? Can we change the themes? Can we change centrally? Do we need change the code on individual pages? Thanks all :)
You’ll need to create a custom menu module with better accessibility coding standards that looks just like your live site’s menu. Once done just replace the menu with your new module
